warning_structured_output_failed:
--- MODEL WARNING ---
Model '{model_name}' failed to respond to a structured (JSON) prompt. This is common for models not specifically trained for function calling. The model will not be asked for JSON again this session.
Falling back to Command Handler...
Error: {e}
warning_model_scan_fail: [SYSTEM WARNING] Could not determine context length for model '{model_id}'. It will not be used to set the context limit. Error: {e}
warning_timekeeper_fail: [TIMEKEEPER WARNING] Failed to parse duration from response: '{raw_response}'. Defaulting to 30s.
warning_memory_summarize_fail: [MEMORY WARNING] MNEMOSYNE summarization failed. Storing original text.
warning_memory_no_agent: [MEMORY WARNING] MNEMOSYNE agent not found in agents.json. Storing original text.
warning_character_create_no_sentence: [SYSTEM CREATE WARNING] Could not find original sentence for procgen NPC. Aborting.
warning_character_create_bad_name: [SYSTEM CREATE WARNING] Could not generate a valid name from context. LLM Response: '{response}'
warning_character_create_no_desc: [SYSTEM CREATE WARNING] Could not generate a description.
warning_character_create_no_instr: [SYSTEM CREATE WARNING] Could not generate instructions.
warning_peg_placement_no_director: [PEG Placement WARNING] Director agent not found.
warning_peg_placement_no_walkable: [PEG Placement WARNING] No walkable tile in feature '{feature_tag}'. Placing randomly nearby.
warning_peg_placement_no_bbox: [PEG Placement WARNING] Feature '{feature_tag}' has no bounding box.
warning_peg_placement_no_feature: [PEG Placement WARNING] Could not find feature for tag '{feature_tag}'.
warning_position_unsupported_relation: [POSITION WARNING] Received unsupported relation '{relation}'. Defaulting to 'NEXT_TO'.
warning_position_no_adjacent: [POSITION] No walkable adjacent tiles found for '{target_name}'.
warning_parser_primary_fail: [PARSER] Primary parse failed. Using context-aware fallback: '{fallback_task_key}'
warning_parser_fallback_fail_json: [PARSER] Context-aware fallback FAILED to produce valid JSON.
warning_parser_all_methods_failed: [PARSER] All parsing methods failed for agent type '{agent_type}'.
warning_parser_legacy_fallback: [PARSER] All other methods failed. Falling back to legacy regex for Director.
warning_gen_validation_bad_id: [GENERATION VALIDATION FAILED] Instruction '{tag}' has invalid feature_id: '{feature_id}'.
warning_gen_validation_bad_size: [GENERATION VALIDATION FAILED] Instruction '{tag}' has invalid size: '{size}'.
warning_gen_validation_bad_relation: [GENERATION VALIDATION FAILED] Instruction '{tag}' has invalid relation: '{relation}'.
warning_gen_target_not_found: [GENERATION WARNING] Target tag '{target_tag}' not found. Placing in center.
warning_gen_no_instructions: [GENERATION] No instructions provided. Map will be an empty room.
warning_placement_nonexistent_entity: [PLACEMENT WARNING] Tried to place non-existent entity '{entity_name}'.
warning_placement_no_valid_placement: [PLACEMENT WARNING] No valid placement for '{entity_name}'. Leaving at random position.
warning_placement_target_not_found: [PLACEMENT WARNING] Target feature '{target_tag}' not found for placing '{entity_name}'.
warning_placement_no_walkable: [PLACEMENT WARNING] Could not find a valid walkable tile to place '{entity_name}' next to '{target_tag}'.
warning_time_parse_fail: [SYSTEM WARNING] Could not parse saved time. Using default.
